Featuring a selection of the tragic diva's most memorable arias alongside duets with other great artists including Giuseppe di Stefano & Nicolai Gedda. Repertoire is taken from the great works of Puccini, Verdi, Bellini, Bizet & many more. This special set includes two CDs (28 tracks), a luxury 100-page booklet containing stunning photos, most of which have never been used before, some of which were obtained from the Callas auction last year, all housed in a deluxe slipcase. 2001.
